entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
